channel.title: Gaming journalism at its finest
channel.description:
Just figured I'd post this here for anyone interested
[url]https://wosland.podgamer.com/the-wainwright-profile/[/url]

item.title: Gaming journalism at its finest
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
Yeah, big reviewers are often shills for the games they review. It has been blatantly obvious all over the place for a long time. Whatcha gonna do? It’s a big money business now. It happens. Thankfully, with all the small time and online reviewers, the truth isn’t hidden for long. Word gets out, and people find out if a game is shit quickly enough.

Bummed about a guy losing his job essentially for speaking honestly and calling people out. Shitty dude.

Read full topic

item.title: Gaming journalism at its finest
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
It is a big deal (relative to how big a deal anything can really be in games media, of course), and I don’t give a fuck if every single games “journalist” does it. It’s horseshit and a total embarrassment.

It sucks for Wainwright that she got strung up for it when there are plenty of other equally worthy candidates, but everything she’s done so far in response has just shown how flat-out guilty she is.

Read full topic
